mapper.select: select g.goods_no, g.goods_name,od.number,o.status, adr.recevier,adr.mobile,adr.address,g.price, DATE_FORMAT(o.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.payDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') payDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.takeDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') takeDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.sendDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.washDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') washDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.hangDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') hangDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.receiveDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') receiveDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.takeBackDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') takeBackDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.deliverDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') deliverDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.confirmDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') confirmDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.reviewDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') reviewDate from order_detail od ,`order` o, goods g,address adr where od.goods_no = g.goods_no and adr.address_id = o.addressId and od.order_id = o.order_id and od.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY g.goods_no
